summary: You have never got wings so alive like this one !
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffd966]Do you interested in new mod for flying with wings ?[/color]
Here is my vision how flying should be:
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64769/?]Real Flying (with Gliding and Collisions)[/url][/b]
[size=2]( I hope you like it :) )[/size]


[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
You will get an ability to cook potions, offering your character an animated dragon wings.
These wings change its animation accordingly to the character behavior.
They react on: attack, jump, sneak, sprint, swim (or fly) events.

This mod absolutely independent, conflict-less, have no requirements, and don't leave any tracks in your save file after uninstall !

I highly recommend to try it with another great mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15775/]<Flying Mod>[/url]. Wings will know when you start flying.

[heading][color=yellow]Main features of the mod:[/color][/heading]
- using its own [color=yellow][b][u]BEHAVIOR[/u][/b][/color] to change animation
- no scripts used
- no need for FNIS
- no need for SKSE
- work with ANY body and skeleton
- don't use armour/cloth slots
- all records in ESP are unique, without any overrides
- all resources are its own and conflict-less
- load order is doesn't matter

Video from [b]Gruntlock[/b]:__________________________________________________ Video from [b]Shinji72[/b]:
[youtube]V1mbEzAloTo[/youtube] [youtube]CHEb3YevJNM[/youtube]

[heading][color=yellow]How to get wings:[/color][/heading]
You need to make a muta-potions in cooking pot.
(recipes are situated in "[b]Misc[/b]" section of the pot)
To lose wings, use potion "Mutagen: Cure mutations"

[heading][color=yellow]Requirements:[/color][/heading]
none

[heading][color=yellow]Install:[/color][/heading]
Unpack mod to the game's folder "..Data" and activate mod in launcher.

[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall:[/color][/heading]
Just delete all installed files of this mod.

[heading][color=yellow]Incompatibilities:[/color][/heading]
none

[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
Lightning for awesome textures for Alduin dragon (mod "More Dramatic Alduin Retexture")
Developers of Blender 2.65+
Developers of Paint.NET
Developers of Audacity
Developers of Notepad++
NifTools team for NifSkope
Figment for Hkxcmd tool
Bethesda for Skyrim and Creation Kit
+ my own tools for export/import models and animation for newest Blender:
I have used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51351]"Animation Tools N4 - Body Animator"[/url] to create skeleton/animation for this mod.
I have used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54097]"Behaviour files creator"[/url] to create custom behaviour file for the wings.

[heading][color=yellow]Permissions:[/color][/heading]
Don't change anything and don't upload it to another sites without my permission, please.

[heading][color=yellow]PS:[/color][/heading]
[color=lightblue][b]If you like this mod, please spread a word about it to make more people be known about new way of creation it offers.
I would like more modmakers to be involved in creation of animated stuff like this.
[/b][/color]

[heading][color=yellow]Plans for future updates:[/color][/heading]
- try to make more gliding
- something else ... (maybe)
author: Anton

files.name: Animated Dragon Wings
files.changelogHtml: - Initial release (has conflictless ideality described in description)

files.name: Animated Dragon Wings - Update 01
files.changelogHtml:
- adds some sort of "gliding" when jumping (high jump and no fall damage)
- adds switch spells to control the wings (on/off)
- changes "swing" sounds
- fixes some names for the potions

files.name: Animated Dragon Wings - Update 02
files.changelogHtml:
- added two new type of wings (Evil dragon wings and Bloody dragon wing)
- changed sprint animation (one more time)
- changed behavior for almost all animations
- added new animation for flying forward
- added animation for flying down (without movement)
- changed base of the wings (a little)
- now "HighJump" will not disappear after loaded the savegame, or changed cells
- now "HighJump" height returns to previous value (but not default one)
- optionally, added two archives with wings, scaled to 150% and 50%
